name: League of Legends
description: League of Legends is a multiplayer online battle arena game. This game was inspired by Warcraft III: The Frozen Throne mod Defense.

name: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG)
developer(s): PUBG Corporation, Krafton, Tencent Games, Xbox Game Studios
description: PUBG is an online multiplayer battle royale game, players will been a surviver during in an arena, then kills each other until last one win.

name: Fortnite
description: Fortnite is an online video game, a free-to-play battle royale game where up to 100 players are given complete freedom to create worlds and battle arenas.

name: CrossFire
description: CrossFire is an online tactical first-person shooter (FPS), the most played game in the world by player count of all time, and world's top-grossing online game in 2014.

name: Dungeon Fighter Online (DFO)
description: DFO is a multiplayer PC beat 'em up video game. DFO is one of the highest-grossing and most played video games of all time, reaching a total of 600 million players world wide.

name: Counter-Strike:Global Offensive (CS:GO)
description: CS:GO is a multiplayer first-person shooter video game, the gameplay is similar to the CS, but using Source Engine enhanced version to improve the picture authenticity

name: Overwatch
description: Overwatch is a team-based multiplayer first-person shooter, players able to choice about over 30 characters, and each characters havd their unique style of play.

name: World of Warcraft (WOW)
description: WOW is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game, it was the world's most popular MMORPG by player count nearly 10 million in 2009.

name: Warframe
description: Warframe is a free-to-play action role playing PVE third-person shooter multiplayer online game.

name: GhostX Ultimate
description: GhostX Ultimate is a free to play 3D sci-fi MMORPG, players will caring a weapons name Nanobot to fight against the devil. This is unique theme and unique gameplay with fast paced combat.
